mapper.select:
SELECT A.RNUM , A.RSV_NO , A.RSV_DATETIME , A.RSV_REQ_DATETIME , A.RSV_STATE , A.RSV_TYPE , A.RSV_MEMBER_ID , A.RSV_TRAINER_MEMBER_ID , D.MEMBER_NAME RSV_MEMBER_NAME FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.RSV_NO , B.RSV_DATETIME , B.RSV_REQ_DATETIME , B.RSV_STATE , B.RSV_TYPE , B.RSV_MEMBER_ID , B.RSV_TRAINER_MEMBER_ID FROM (SELECT C.RSV_NO , C.RSV_DATETIME , C.RSV_REQ_DATETIME , C.RSV_STATE , C.RSV_TYPE , C.RSV_MEMBER_ID , C.RSV_TRAINER_MEMBER_ID FROM TBL_RESERVATION C ) B
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{ paginationInfo.firstRecordIndex } + #{ recordsPerPage } ) A JOIN TBL_MEMBER D ON (A.RSV_MEMBER_ID = D.MEMBER_ID) WHERE A.RNUM > #{ paginationInfo.firstRecordIndex }
AND A.RSV_DATETIME BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{searchKeyword}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{searchKeyword}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1
AND D.MEMBER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND A.RSV_TRAINER_MEMBER_ID = #{ memberId } ORDER BY A.RSV_NO ASC

SELECT A.RSV_NO , A.RSV_DATETIME , A.RSV_REQ_DATETIME , A.RSV_STATE , A.RSV_TYPE , A.RSV_MEMBER_ID , A.RSV_TRAINER_MEMBER_ID , B.MEMBER_NAME RSV_MEMBER_NAME FROM TBL_RESERVATION A JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON (A.RSV_MEMBER_ID = B.MEMBER_ID) WHERE A.RSV_TRAINER_MEMBER_ID = #{ id } AND A.RSV_STATE = 'Y'

SELECT A.RSV_NO , A.RSV_DATETIME , A.RSV_REQ_DATETIME , A.RSV_STATE , A.RSV_TYPE , A.RSV_MEMBER_ID , A.RSV_TRAINER_MEMBER_ID , B.MEMBER_NAME RSV_MEMBER_NAME FROM TBL_RESERVATION A JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON (A.RSV_MEMBER_ID = B.MEMBER_ID) WHERE A.RSV_NO = #{ no }

SELECT A.RCH_NO , A.RCH_RSV_NO , A.RCH_REQ_DATETIME , A.RCH_DATETIME , A.RCH_STATE , B.RSV_NO , B.RSV_DATETIME , B.RSV_REQ_DATETIME , B.RSV_STATE , B.RSV_TYPE , B.RSV_MEMBER_ID , B.RSV_TRAINER_MEMBER_ID , C.MEMBER_NAME RSV_MEMBER_NAME FROM TBL_RESERVATION_CHANGE A JOIN TBL_RESERVATION B ON (A.RCH_RSV_NO = B.RSV_NO) JOIN TBL_MEMBER C ON (B.RSV_MEMBER_ID = C.MEMBER_ID) WHERE A.RCH_RSV_NO = #{ no }
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TBL_RESERVATION WHERE RSV_NO = #{ reservationNo }
DELETE FROM TBL_RESERVATION_CHANGE WHERE RCH_RSV_NO = #{ reservationNo }
